Chapter 19 was mostly about old statistics, declining morals, and
deformities described in a way that most would find very offensive
today.

entry.title: Game: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4 Golden (Vita, 2012) (10)
entry.content:
Game: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4 Golden (Vita, 2012) (10)20130525
I just played through some social stuff, including most of the
motorcycle introduction sequence. The campout was fun.

Later in the day, I played again and got to open Rise's dungeon,
but I plan on getting the bonus items from the Bath House before
going in.

entry.title: Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (17)
entry.content:
Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (17)20130525
The pictures in Chapter 18 were particularly gross. I enjoyed
reading about the way they studied lions and rats to determine
what organs of animals they ate, rather than just the muscle meat
that modern Westerns eat.
  • Books
  • 1939

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 5 (SNES, 1992) (9)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 5 (SNES, 1992) (9)20130524
Today I played for about six hours (in two chunks) and beat the
game. I played from the Solitary Island Temple to the end of the
game.

It really is remarkable how this game is connected to Final
Fantasy 6. There's Gogo. The final boss is made of many pieces
sticking out in a weird way. A lot of the same summoned monsters
are secret bosses. It's very cool.

I was able to beat the last few bosses by spamming Bahamut while
on Haste2, with the other characters providing backup. Some of
them were very nerve-wracking. I think the most tense part, other
than the final battle (which I did in one try), was getting from
the Castle save spot to the Necrophobe save spot. The *REDACTED* Prince
boss was very hard.

I beat the game at just level 36, which seems very low. I wasn't
able to beat the optional bosses Omega or Shinryuu and I didn't
try to go find Phoenix. 

This is definitely an amazing game that fits within the Final
Fantasy canon for me. I think I will continue to play it far into
the future. Next time I think I'll try a different class
configuration though. For instance, I never used the Magic
Knight, Dragon Knight, or even Black magic.

I'm a bit surprised I was able to beat it in just 27 hours, with
basically no grinding after I mastered my classes and even before
then, I mainly did grinding for gold. There's a lot of power in
the job system.

Total time: 27:28
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 5
  • SNES
  • 1992

entry.title: Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (15)
entry.content:
Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (15)20130523
Chapter 16 was similar to Chapter 15, except in much more detail
and on a smaller subject. I found it tiring, since I've read so
much before, but I think it would be in the critical path of the
book.

entry.title: Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (14)
entry.content:
Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (14)20130522
Chapter 15 is the most clear summary of what the point of the book
is and what its contribution is. I recommend reading it and
skipping everything before it.

entry.title: Fringe - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Power Hungry
entry.content:
Fringe - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Power Hungry20130522
We watched this episode and it stayed true to the cookie-cutter
formula of every other episode. My wife and I decided we wouldn't
watch the show any more, because it hadn't grabbed us and we
didn't see any signs of new ideas.
  • TV Shows
  • Fringe

entry.title: Movie: The Godfather Part III, by Francis Ford Coppola (1990)
entry.content:
Movie: The Godfather Part III, by Francis Ford Coppola (1990)20130521
I'm not sure why this movie has such a bad reputation. I liked it
quite a bit. I like that it so depressing and that everyone
loses. I think it is a good reminder of what happens to
criminals. I even like Sofia Coppola in it, I think it is neat that
her aunt plays her aunt in the movie. I especially like all the
Catholic intrigue.
  • Movies
  • 1990

entry.title: Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (12)
entry.content:
Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (12)20130520
In its discussion of the ancient Peruvians in Chapter 13, Price
betrays a more thorough belief in the myth of the noble savage
than most other chapters.
  • Books
  • 1939

entry.content:
Movie: The Best Two Years, directed by Scott S. Anderson (2003)20130520
This is a fun movie. I recommended it to someone to learn about
missionaries, so I wanted to watch it again and remember what it
was like. Definitely good.

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 5 (SNES, 1992) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 5 (SNES, 1992) (8)20130519
I played for about three hours and got the first tablet in
World 3. Some of the random battles have been very tough. I like
this game, but I feel like I know what is going to happen because
I'm at that point in the game where to road to end is open and
you have all the tools you'll use until the end.

In the evening I played for about an hour and beat Odin and got
some of the sealed weapons. Unfortunately I had to fight him
twice because Excalibur heals him. D'oh!

Total time: 21:49
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 5
  • SNES
  • 1992

entry.title: Movie: Jack Reacher, starring Tom Cruise (2012)
entry.content:
Movie: Jack Reacher, starring Tom Cruise (2012)20130518
This was a cool movie. I like the humorous moments and thought that
the Reacher character was very interesting. I thought the romance
was too subdued and seemed just there for trailer montages. The
strategy and intrigued of Reacher was cool. I'm interested in
seeing if the books are any good. Rosamund Pike is very pretty and
Cruise is great.
  • Movies
  • 2012

entry.title: Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (9)
entry.content:
Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (9)20130517
It was fascinating to read in Chapter 9 about how the African
tribes he visited would draw and drink the blood of steers
regularly.

Chapter 10 has an interesting discussion of the morals and mores
of the Aboriginals. I like the idea that the young aren't allowed
to hunt weak animals, but should leave them for the old.
  • Books
  • 1939

entry.title: Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (8)
entry.content:
Book: Nutrition and Physical Degeneration, by Weston A. Price (1939) (8)20130512
For some reason the pictures in chapter 8 were the
grossest. Nothing really new in terms of nutrition, but it was fun
to read about the islanders a little.

entry.title: Movie: The Godfather Part II, by Francis Ford Coppola (1974) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: The Godfather Part II, by Francis Ford Coppola (1974) (2)20130512
We watched the rest and it was great. The end was not as powerful,
but it was very somber and gave the feeling the story needed to end
on. When Michael closes the door on Kay without a word... that's so
brutal.
  • Movies
  • 1974

entry.title: Game: Sin & Punishment: Star Successor (Wii, 2009) (16)
entry.content:
Game: Sin & Punishment: Star Successor (Wii, 2009) (16)20130511
I played this game and beat it on Easy with Isa & Kachi. It took 2
hours and 47 minutes. I got new high scores on Stages 5 and 7. I
decided to make this little table to track my progress as I play
it regularly. This game is so amazing. I watched all the
cut-scenes today and they are nuts.

| Level       | This Score  | This Destroyed | Best Score  | Best Destroyed | Rank | Last Update |
| Entire Game | 148,158,940 |          5,804 | 167,780,616 |          5,981 |   97 |             |
| Stg 0       | 8,398,850   |            197 | 8,723,894   |            208 |  250 |             |
| Stg 1       | 15,167,535  |            591 | 22,241,284  |            588 |   80 |             |
| Stg 2       | 39,905,904  |            978 | 45,181,199  |            962 |  143 |             |
| Stg 3       | 22,718,971  |          1,015 | 26,431,258  |          1,035 |  136 |             |
| Stg 4       | 22,861,057  |            781 | 25,897,071  |            885 |  192 |             |
| Stg 5       | 11,280,408  |            635 | 11,280,408  |            635 |  257 | Today       |
| Stg 6       | 16,726,359  |            795 | 20,246,798  |            928 |  117 |             |
| Stg 7       | 11,099,856  |            812 | 11,099,856  |            812 |  156 | Today       |

Total time: 3:53

  • Sin & Punishment: Star Successor
